data.title: Classes Archive
data.meta_description: Urban Boxing DC is the best boxing gym in Washington, DC awarded by Washingtonian. 2017 Best Gym Award by Men's Fitness. Try your first class for FREE.
data.text:
BOXING (ALL LEVELS)

Our boxing classes are the perfect combination of fast-paced cardio, strength training, and technique development, designed to help you develop your stamina, agility, and body strength. In addition to learning proper form, footwork, and ways to maximize the power in your punches, our instructors at Urban Boxing have developed energizing workouts that are guaranteed to […]

Read More

BOXING (Level 1)

No experience necessary. This class combines boxing fundamentals, plyometrics and high intensity interval training, to boost your heart rate and burn hundreds of calories. The basic instruction (punches, combinations, footwork, ducking and slipping) combined with a full body workout! This is where beginners learn the fundamentals and more experienced members get back to basics.

Read More

BOXING (Level 2)

A step above Boxing Level 1. Ready to take what you’ve learned and apply it to partner and mitt work? This class is for you. Level 2 encompasses the technical aspects of boxing with core strengthening exercises. Learn boxing skills such as correct form in throwing jabs, hooks and uppercuts, while working at an intense […]

Read More

BOXING BOOTCAMP

A hybrid of our Strength & Conditioning + Boxing classes, this class will sculpt, tone and build your body to its peak performance. Great for all fitness levels. Boxing Bootcamp may incorporate weights, agility drills, TRX bands, shadow boxing, bag work, and core strengthening exercises. You will sweat like crazy, build a rock-solid core and […]

Read More

KICKBOXING

This class will leave you sweating, pumped, and ready to take on the world! Blends of intervals, and endurance training will give you that high-powered workout you can’t get enough of. Great for all fitness levels. Kickboxing includes bag work, punch – kick – knee elbow strikes, partner drills, pad work, and core strengthening exercises. […]

Read More

SPARRING (INVITATION ONLY)

A fast paced and more in depth boxing training that takes place in the ring. Footwork, speed and agility from Level I and Level II classes are woven together in succession and students further develop themselves as boxers by sparring with the most experienced members of Urban Boxing. This invitation only class is an absolute […]

Read More

MUAY THAI (THAI BOXING)

Muay Thai, also known as Thai Boxing and the art of eight limbs, is a combat sport of Thailand that gained widespread popularity around the twentieth century. Characterized by the combined use of fists, elbows, knees and shins, Muay Thai is an efficient, full-body contact style of fighting that relies heavily on kicks and body […]

Read More

COMPETITION TEAM JIU-JITSU (INVITATION ONLY)

Urban Boxing’s BJJ program will help you develop your skills whether you’re looking to jump start your martial arts career as a brand new grappler or get in shape using one of the best and most popular martial arts program in the industry today. Characteristics: Difficulty Level 91% Fat Loss Effectiveness 65% Strength Building 70% Fun 57% […]

Read More

JIU-JITSU (NO-GI)

Urban Boxing’s BJJ program will help you develop your skills whether you’re looking to jump start your martial arts career as a brand new grappler or get in shape using one of the best and most popular martial arts program in the industry today. Characteristics: Difficulty Level 91% Fat Loss Effectiveness 65% Strength Building 70% Fun 57% […]
